Texts.Eng: Bring the ^green;Chemlab^reset; to ^orange;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;
Chemistry is a ^orange;extremely important^reset; science that will allow you to combine chemicals to create all sorts of useful things. Build an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; and give it a shot.
Nicely done. Now you'll need to find some space for this in your own base.
